com.opengamma.strata.calc.config.pricing

Interface FunctionGroup<T extends CalculationTarget>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the calculation target
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFunctionGroup

    public interface FunctionGroup<T extends CalculationTarget>
    A function group provides configuration for functions that perform calculations.

    All functions in a group operate on the same type of calculation target.

    Typically the functions in a group will be related in some way, for example they might all use the same model to calculate their result.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableSet<Measure> configuredMeasures(CalculationTarget target)
      Returns the set of measures configured for a calculation target.
      Optional<FunctionConfig<T>> functionConfig(CalculationTarget target, Measure measure)
      Returns configuration for a function to calculate the value of a measure for a target.

    • Method Detail

      • functionConfig

        Optional<FunctionConfig<T>> functionConfig(CalculationTarget target,
                                           Measure measure)
        Returns configuration for a function to calculate the value of a measure for a target.

        If this group has no function capable of calculating the value an empty optional is returned.

        Parameters:
        target - the target of the calculation
        measure - the measure that needs to be calculated
        Returns:
        configuration for a function to calculate the value of a measure for a target if this group has one

      • configuredMeasures

        ImmutableSet<Measure> configuredMeasures(CalculationTarget target)
        Returns the set of measures configured for a calculation target.
        Parameters:
        target - the calculation target
        Returns:
        the set of measures configured for a calculation target
